brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerate, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Efficacy of CYH33
brief_summary: This study is a Multi-center, Open-label, single arm, Dose Escalation and Dose Extension Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Safety , Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Preliminary Efficacy of CYH33 in Advanced Solid Tumors Patients.
